loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Moiyao

texts.en: Moiyao, who still runs a retail shop and earns a good income, has applied for a loan of KES 80,000 from KADET LTD, to restock his shop with a variety of petroleum products. The anticipated profits will be reinvested for business expansion. His dream is to be successful in life.

loans.use: to buy more petroleum products to sell.

loans.name: Casilda

texts.es:
Casilda, de 51 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y amable con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Es separada del padre de sus hijos. Vive en su propia casa en compañía de sus hijas de 25 y 24 años de edad. La actividad que realiza Casilda es la venda de comidas como son desayunos y menús, también  bebidas gaseosas de diversos sabores. Todos estos alimentos los prepara en su local, donde atiende amablemente  a sus clientes ganándose sus preferencias. Tiene más de 7 años dedicándose a este negocio y hasta el momento le ayuda su hija en la atención a los clientes. Le gusta su negocio por los ingresos económicos, el tener un oficio que le sirvió para sacar adelante a sus hijas desde que se separo de su pareja, se siente orgullosa de haber logrado salir adelante a pesar de las dificultades. Considera a su negocio rentable por las ganancias que le deja. Por consiguiente, tiene planes de continuar con su negocio, y con sus ganancias desea adquirir una unidad de transporte para disminuir costos de traslado. Este será el préstamo número 14 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además de sentirse cómoda con su banco comunal por el apoyo que vienen prestando a las personas brindándoles líneas de créditos.
Con el monto solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de los ingredientes para la preparación de los alimentos, también de bebidas gaseosas para tener un stock disponible para la venta, buscando los precios mas bajos por sus compras al contado.
texts.en:
Casilda, 51 years old, is a happy and likable woman with lots of desire to get ahead. She is separated from the father of her children. She lives in her own house with her daughters, who are twenty-five and twenty-four years old. Casilda sells food, such as breakfast and set lunches, as well as various flavors of soda pop. She prepares these meals in her store, where she tends to her customers in a likeable manner, earning their repeat business. She has spent more than seven years working this way, and currently her daughter helps her serve her customers. She likes her business because of the economic revenue it provides her, and the benefit of having a trade which has helped her to get ahead and provide for her daughters ever since she separated from her companion. She is proud to have managed to get ahead in spite of her difficulties. She considers her business to be profitable due to the income it provides her. As a result, she plans to continue with her business. With her profits she would like to acquire a means of transport to reduce transport costs. This will be her fourteenth loan with MFP [Microfinanzas Prisma]. She is looking forward to working with MFP to realize her plans. Additionally, she feels comfortable with her communal bank for the support that it continues to offer folks by providing them with lines of credit.
Casilda will invest the 3000 PEN [$1125] requested by purchasing ingredients to prepare meals, as well as soda pop, to have a stock available for sale. She will look for lower prices for her cash purchases.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to prepare meals.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Mout

texts.en:
Mout, age 45, is the widowed mother of three children, living in Baray district of Kompong Tom province. She has been running three businesses at the same time to support her living. The first priority of her business is rice farming, followed by rice-trading and pig-raising. She normally is able to generate something in the neighborhood of 3.60 USD per day from these activities. Two of her children work as local construction laborers in order to help raise the family's standard of living.

Mout is applying for a loan of 300 USD to purchase a used motorcycle for her children to use to commute to their workplaces. This will help reduce the daily expenses of her family and thereby increase her income. 

In the future, Mout wants to save money to buy different types of farming machines to develop her rice farming business.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle for her children to use to commute to their workplaces.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es:
Reyna de 23 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora, carismática con muchas ganas de superación. Es conviviente con Segundo, quien se dedica al transporte, y es padre de su único hijo de 4 años de edad. Juntos habitan cómodamente en la casa de sus padres, a quien cuidan y apoyan con los gatos de casa.
La actividad que realiza  Reyna es la crianza de pollos de granja, para esto cuenta con un galpón de capacidad para 1000 pollos, que está ubicado en su propio terreno, para luego venderlo a los comerciantes de los mercados más cercanos donde tiene una clientela que se sabido ganar por sus entregas puntuales y buen servicio .
Ésta actividad lo inicio gracias a la idea de su pareja que también le apoyo con un pequeño aporte de capital.  Lo considera rentable ya que gracias a ello tienen un buen ingreso económico, y así puede apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de su casa y puede brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su menor hijo, también tiene mucha demanda. Espera seguir creciendo y  ampliar su galpón y así tener una mayor producción. Antes de empezar con éste negocio, no tenía problemas económicos, sino comenta decidió empezar para poder tener una ocupación e ir creciendo como empresaria. Ahora viendo los buenos resultados, desea continuar con su negocio. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP. Se siente contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Por eso se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, como lo venía haciendo en los créditos anteriores. Además se siente a gusto con su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado de 1200 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de materiales como listones, hojas de irapay y otros, para la construcción de otro galpón de capacidad para 1000 pollos, así aumentar su capacidad de producción viendo crecer su negocio, buscando conseguir preciso bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Reyna is 23, and an enterprising, charismatic woman who is very eager to improve herself.  She is in a common-law relationship with Segundo, who works in transportation, and is the father of her one 4-year-old son. They live together comfortably in the house of her parents, whom they look after and help with the household expenses.

Reyna raises free-range chickens. For this she has a shed with with a capacity for 1000 chickens, located on her own piece of land. She sells them to the traders in the nearest markets, where she has a clientele that has learned to take advantage of her timely deliveries and good service.

She started this business thanks to her partner's idea, who also supported her with a small capital contribution. She considers the business to be profitable because thanks to it they have a good income. It enables her to support her parents with the household expenses and provide a better quality of life to her young son. 

She also has a lot of demand. She hopes to continue growing, and expanding her shed, and so have greater production. Before starting this business she did not have financial problems, but says she decided to start a business to be able to have an occupation and gradually develop as a business person. Now, seeing the good results, she wishes to continue with her business. 

This will be her fourth loan with the MFP institution. She feels happy to know that she will have financial support to advance her business. That is why she promises to make her installment payments on time, as she has been doing with her previous loans. In addition, she feels comfortable with her communal bank, as she considers the group close-knit and supportive.

With the requested amount of 1,200 nuevos soles, she will invest in the purchase of materials such as strips of wood,  irapay leaves (tropical plant used for thatching) and other materials to build another shed with a capacity for 1000 chickens. This way she will increase her production capacity, see her business grow, and seek to obtain low prices for her volume purchases.

loans.use: To buy boards, leaves for thatching, and strips of wood, for constructing more chicken sheds with 1,000 bird capacity.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Paola Fernenda

texts.es:
La Señorita. Paola es socia del banco comunal Fe y Alegría, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca que es la tercera ciudad más importante del país, cuenta con una belleza natural y arquitectónica, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
 
La Señorita. Paola tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera vive con sus padres a quienes ayuda  económicamente, su papá es de profesión chofer y labora prestando sus servicios en una unidad de taxi que es de su propiedad y su mamá es comerciante, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Ella es  cosmetóloga, tiene un local en el cual ofrece sus servicios hace tres meses, realiza toda clase de tratamientos para la piel y labora de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 2 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una colcha térmica para su local.

Su meta es tener un Spa.
texts.en:
Señorita Paola is a member of the communal bank "Fe y Alegría" (Faith and Happiness).  She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is the country's third most important city.  It has natural and architectural beauty.  The residents there maintain the culture and traditions of their people.
 
Señorita Paola is 21 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents, who she helps financially.  Her father is a driver and lends his services to a taxi unit.  He has his own taxi.  Her mother is a shopkeeper.  They don't own their own home; they live in a rented house.
 
Señorita Paola is a cosmetologist.  For the last three months, she has offered her services from a small shop.  She can do all kinds of skin treatments.  She works from Monday to Friday from 8:00 in the morning until 7:00 at night.

Señorita Paola has been a member of her communal bank for 2 years, and she is going to invest her new loan in the purchase of a thermal bedspread for her shop. 

Her goal is to own a Spa.

loans.use: to purchase a thermal bedspread.

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es: La señora Ana , es habitante del municipio de Masaya , junto a su familia , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida , agradece a Kiva por el apoyo que le brinda cada año para su cultivo de yuca , la mayor dificultad que se le presento fue un accidente que sufrio uno de sus hijos ya que ella tuvo que recurrir de sus recursos para poder pagar su cura , los planes hacia la plantación es poder sembrar un cuarto de piña y así mejorar sus ingresos  . El credito lo quiere para comprar fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para la plantacion de yuca , tambien va a comprar madera de yuca para sembrar mas de una manzana ya que estará lista la producción dentro de un año , lo cual tiene que quedar bien fertilizada al siembra
texts.en:
Ana lives in the municipality of Masaya with her family. Her intention is to improve her family's standard of living. She is grateful to Kiva for the support it offers her every year for her yuca crop. 

The greatest difficulty that has arisen was an accident one of her children suffered, as she had to draw on her resources to pay for his healing. Her plan for her plantation is to sow a quarter of it in pineapple, and in this way improve her income. 

She wants the loan to to buy fertilizers and agricultural supplies for her yuca plantation. She is also going to buy yuca plants for sowing more than a manzana (1.73 acres), as it will be ready to produce within a year, and it needs to be well-fertilized at planting time.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Lucia Alexandra

texts.es:
La Señora. Lucia es socia del banco comunal Fe y Alegría, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca que es la tercera ciudad más importante del país, cuenta con una belleza natural y arquitectónica, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
 
Doña Lucia tiene 32 años, es madre soltera de una niña de 8 años de edad  que está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus padres pero independiente, la casa es propiedad de sus padres.
 
La Señora Lucia se dedica a la venta de plásticos, labora de lunes a sábados desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde, negocio en el que se encuentra hace 2 años.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace un año y medio, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de artículos de plástico para incrementar en su negocio.
 
Su meta es de crecer en su negocio y salir adelante con su hija.
texts.en:
Lucia is a member of the communal back Fe y Alegria (Faith and Happiness). She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is the third most important city in Ecuador. It has a lot of natural and architectural beauty. Its inhabitants continue the culture and traditions of their people. 

Lucia is 32 years old and a single mother of an eight year old girl, who is studying in a public school in the city. They do not have their own house and as such, live in a house owned by her parents.

She sells plastic items and works from Monday through Saturday, from seven in the morning til five in the afternoon. She has been running this business for two years. She has been a member of the communal bank for a year and a half and she will invest this new loan in the purchase of plastic items so she can grow her business.

Her goal is to continue growing her business and get ahead in life with her daughter.

loans.use: to purchase plastic items

loans.name: Luz Cristina

texts.es:
La Señora. Luz es socia del banco comunal Fe y Alegría, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es la tercera ciudad más importante  del país, cuenta con una belleza natural y arquitectónica, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
 
La Señora. Luz tiene 60 años, es divorciada pero en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, una de sus hijas que es soltera estudia en la universidad. No tiene casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

La Señora. Luz esta delicada de salud ya que se encuentra en un tratamiento para la artritis y también por un problema de ulcera. Ella tiene un local hace 20 años en el cual vende ropa y zapatos. Hace apenas 3 meses decidió también dedicarse a  la venta de comida rápida ya que le gusta la atención al cliente.
  
En esta ocasión va a invertir su nuevo crédito en la compra de un horno para crecer en la venta de comida rápida. La banca comunal le gusta por el apoyo de sus amigas y el compañerismo de todas las socias.

Su sueño es conservar su salud.
texts.en:
Luz is a member of the 'Fe y Alegria' community bank.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, the third most important city in Ecuador.  This city has both natural and architectural beauty and its people maintain their culture and traditions.

Luz is 60 years old.  She is divorced but has six children from her marriage who are all adults.  One of her daughters is single and studying at university.  Luz does not own her own home and so they live in a rental house.

Luz's health is poor as she is receiving treatment for arthritis and also for an ulcer problem.  She has been selling clothing and shoes from her sales premises for 20 years.  Three months ago, she also decided to start selling fast food as she enjoys serving customers.

On this occasion, Luz will invest her loan in buying an oven so that she can increase her fast food sales.  She likes her community bank because of the support of her friends and the comradeship that exists between all the members.

Luz's dream is to maintain her health.

loans.use: to buy an oven

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity, 50 years old, is married to Patrick. She supports five members of her family. Charity has been running her curio shop for about 10 years and earns an income of approximately 40,000 KES (Kenya Shillings) a month. 

This is Charity's seventh loan with KADET LTD, after having successfully repaid the previous ones. She wants to use the loan to buy more carvings and gifts for sale. Charity hopes to have a stable business that will improve her family’s living standard.

loans.use: To buy curios for sale

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas, 30 years old, is married to Sammy and is blessed with a 2-year-old child. She owns a shop where she sells eggs. Dorcas started her business two years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000.

For her first loan, Dorcas has requested KES 5,000 to purchase 20 crates of eggs for sale. The anticipated profit will help her open another shop in town. Dorcas hopes to be a wholesaler.

loans.use: To purchase 20 crates of eggs for sale.

loans.name: Chea

texts.en:
Chea, age 52, is a humble resident who has been residing in Dongkor commune, Phnom Penh City. She is married with four children and is involved in the grocery selling business. She sells breakfast, lunch, dinner, and some types of soft drinks in a local market. She works tirelessly from day to day without any rest, except she gets ill because she wants to save money to ensure a bright future for her children. From this business, she is able to generate an average of 5.00 USD per day. 

Recently, there are some broken parts of her house that need to be repaired on time, so Chea requested a loan from HKL to buy some construction supplies and to pay for construction laborer costs. She hopes that her living conditions will improve through using the loan from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy some construction supplies and to pay for construction laborer costs.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan, de 42 años de edad, es una hombre trabajador y empeñoso, además de se amable y cordial con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Es conviviente con Milka quien es ama de casa y lo apoya en las labores del campo, fruto de esa unión tienen 3 hijos de 17, 16 y 15 años de edad  por quienes se esfuerzan en brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Juntos habitan cómodamente su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Juan es la agricultura para eso cuenta con un terreno de 60 hectáreas,  pero solo tiene sembrado 10 hectáreas de maíz, que estarán listos para la cosecha, teniendo compradores para esa producción. Se inicio hace más de 10 años con un capital propio con la ayuda de su pareja, fueron sembrando en poca cantidad, para luego extenderse y aumentar su capacidad de siembra por la demanda de su producto.  Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene su producto y las buenas ganancias que le deja sobre todo en época de escasees de maíz.
Se decidió  a iniciar ésta actividad por la necesidad de contar con un  oficio y un ingreso económico para mantener a su familia y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Viendo los buenos resultados, tiene planes de ampliar su capacidad de siembra a 20 hectáreas ya que cuenta con bastante demanda que no puede atender con su producción actual. Esto le generará más ganancias y verá crecer su actividad. Este será el préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP. Se siente contento que contará con un apoyo financiero para avanzar con sus planes. Por eso se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues los considera ser buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en el pago de personal para la cosecha de su producción de maíz, y tenerlo listo para la entrega a su comprador.
texts.en:
42-year-old Juan is a hard-working and determined man.  He is also kind and friendly, and has a great desire to do well in life.  He lives together with Mika who is a housewife and supports him in his agricultural work.  The couple have three children who are 17, 16 and 15 years old.  They work hard to provide them with a better quality of life.  The family live comfortably together in their own home.

Juan's business is farming.  He has 60 hectares of farmland but only has 10 hectares sown with corn.  The corn is ready to be harvested and he already has buyers for it.  Juan started his business ten years ago with his own capital and the help of his partner.  They started sowing small quantities of crops but then expanded and increased their capacity owing to the demand they had for their produce.  Juan considers his business to be fairly profitable because his produce is in demand and he makes good profits, especially during periods when there is a shortage of corn.

Juan started out in this business because he needed a trade and an income with which to support his family and provide them with a better quality of life.  Given the good results that he has had, he plans to expand his sowing capacity to 20 hectares as he has quite a lot of demand that he can't meet with his current production.  This will make him more profits and he will grow his business.

This will be Juan's third loan from MFP.  He feels happy that he will have financial support in making progress with his plans.  For this reason, he pledges to make his repayments on time as he did with his previous loans.  He says that he feels happy with his community bank as he considers the members to be good people.  Juan will invest the 2,000 soles he has requested in paying laborers to harvest his corn and get it ready to deliver to his buyer.

loans.use: to hire laborers

loans.name: Teopista

texts.en:
Teopista lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has 9 children, four of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (grandchildren). Teopista has operated a business rearing chickens for over 10 years, working 7 days every week. Teopista retails her products from home. She also generates additional income through rental rooms.

Teopista has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX (Ugandan Shillings) from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy chickens and bags of chicken feed. The main business challenges for Teopista include thieves who always break into her chicken houses and steal her chickens, and transportation of chicken feed. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a delivery van to help with transportation and to own burglar-proof doors.

Teopista lives in a home that she owns; she has access to electricity and to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include feeding the family and medication.

loans.use: To buy more chicks and chicken feed

loans.name: Rorn

texts.en:
Rorn, 30, is married and lives with her husband and three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been producing baskets and flat baskets to sell for over ten years, earning approximately US $8 per day. They also raise pigs to sell to generate extra income of about US $3 per day to support the family.

Rorn is requesting a loan of US $600 to purchase a plot of land next to her house to expand her house’s land. In the future, she would like to rebuild her present house and help her children get their Bachelor's Degree.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land next to her house to expand her house’s land

loans.name: Hai

texts.en:
Hai, 54, is married and lives with her husband and son in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running a business, buying smoked fish to resell, for over ten years, earning approximately US $20 per day. Her husband is a soldier who also operates a motor taxi to generate extra income to support the family when he is free from his work. He earns approximately US $6 per day.

Hai's son is going to get a job in Korea. Due to lack of funds, Hai is requesting a loan of US $1,000 to purchase an air ticket for her son to fly to Korea. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase an air ticket for her son to fly to Korea

loans.name: Soda

texts.en:
Soda, 26, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling palm juice and fattening up cattle for over three years, earning approximately four US dollars per day. Her husband runs a public transportation service (motor taxi) and earns approximately three US dollars per day. 

Due to their present motorbike being too old, Soda is requesting a loan of 1,200 US dollars to purchase a new motorbike for her husband's public transportation service, to replace the old one. This new motorbike would enable her husband to attract more customers and generate more income to support the family. 

In the future, Soda would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it much stronger to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for her husband's public transportation service to replace their old one.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha, 41, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fish and shells for over six years, earning approximately 5 USD per day. Her husband is a fisherman who earns about 5 USD per day.

Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Slkha is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to carry her fish to sell in larger amounts and use the money saved on her transportation expense to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a sewing shop for her daughter and build a concrete house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru for the last 23 years. She is 49 years old and single with three children.

She was introduced to KADET Ltd. by one of our field officers and this will be her second loan. She repaid her previous loan well. She plans to use the loan amount to purchase fertilizer, herbicides and seedlings.

In future, Margaret hopes to become one of the leading farmers in her area.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs (fertilizer, herbicides and seedlings)

loans.name: Eang

texts.en:
Eang is 47 years old and a single man who has been living in Dongkor commune of Phnom Penh city. He earns a livelihood by being involved in a business of selling organic fertilizers in Kompong Cham province, where many kinds of crops are grown, so it’s a good place to sell his product.

In order to stabilize this business and run a competition against other entrepreneurs doing the same business, Eang needs some sufficient funds to refill the stock of his merchandise to continually operate his business smoothly. Consequently, Eang decided to borrow a loan of 500 USD to purchase a stock of organic fertilizers to maintain and satisfy his customers.

Eang hopes that he’ll develop his business successfully in the following years and he’ll be able to expand it and become larger.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of organic fertilizers to maintain and satisfy his customers

loans.name: Ena

texts.es:
Ena, de 40 años, es una mujer buena y trabajadora, está casada con Acerio de 53 con quien tiene tres hijos, a sus dos mayores hijos educó y los formó para ser personas buenas para la sociedad hasta que ya sean independientes, mientras que a su menor hijo que aun vive con ella, tiene 15 años continua estudiando. Vive a lado de su esposo en su casa propia y trabajan mucho para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Ena consiste en la venta de productos nutritivos, todos los días sale de su casa en busca de algún nuevo cliente o esperando colocar algún producto nuevo a ellos. En su casa tiene un pequeño mostrador en donde tiene vitrina y exhibe los tipos y variedades de dicho producto. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por 6 años, lo hace sola y es muy feliz haciéndolo.
Disfruta mucho su negocio, pues le permite tener ingresos sin tener que trabajar todo el día, además que le permite tener buenos ingresos para la economía de su hogar, recuerda que antes de iniciar como distribuidora, tenia que esperar mucho a lo que su esposo le pueda dar para disponer de algún dinero, pero desde que empezó a trabajar y a generar ella misma, se dio cuenta que es un apoyo para los ingresos de su hogar. Tiene muchos planes a futuro y desea mas adelante tener una distribuidora en el centro de la ciudad para que pueda ofrecer mejor sus diversos productos nutritivos y enseñar a tener una nutrición adecuada a las personas. Este será el crédito número 8 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar son sus objetivos, además se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores, se siente muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son buenos clientes y muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mas nutrientes y poder ofrecer en mayor variedad a sus clientes, ya que aumentaron muchas personas que la solicitan y desea tener capacidad de respuesta a la demanda de los clientes.
texts.en:
40-year-old Ena is a nice, hard-working woman.  She is married to Acerio, who is 53, and the couple have three children.  Ena already educated and brought up two of her children to be upstanding citizens who now live independently.  Her youngest son still lives with her.  He is 15 years old and still in school.  Ena lives with her husband in her own home and they work hard so that they can enjoy a better quality of life.

Ena's business is selling nutritional products.  She goes out every day in search of new customers or to show existing customers new products that she has.  At home she has a small counter where she displays her different products.  Ena has been in this business for six years.  She works alone and is happy in her work.  She really enjoys her business as it allows her to make income without having to work all day long.  In addition, it makes her good income which helps her household financially.  She recalls that, before she started working, she had to wait a long time for her husband to be able to give her money.  However, since she started working and making her own money, she has been a support him in contributing to their household.  

Ena has many plans for the future and she would like, in the future, to have a store in the city center where she can better sell her nutritional products and teach people to enjoy proper nutrition.

This will be Ena's eighth loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can continue achieving her goals.  She pledges, once again, to make her repayments on time as she did with her previous loans.  She feels very happy to belong to her community bank as all the members are good, responsible people. Ena will use the 1,000 soles she has requested to buy more nutritional products so that she can offer a better variety to her customers.  The number of people who are requesting her products has risen and she would like to have the capacity to meet her demand.

loans.use: to buy more nutritional products

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 23 years old and single. He has an M-PESA (locally known as money transfer) business. He started the business two years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000. He has requested a loan of KES 5,000 to add more float (electronic credits) for running the M-PESA business.

The anticipated profit from his business would help him start another business. He hopes to improve his living standard. This is his first loan.

loans.use: to add more float (electronic credits) for running his M-PESA (money transfer) business.

loans.name: Channa

texts.en:
Channa, 25, is married and resides with her husband in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She has been growing rice, flowers and vegetables to sell for over five years, earning approximately 3 USD per day. Her husband is a taxi driver who earns about 15 USD per day.

In order to improve her family’s economy, Channa is requesting a loan of 700 USD to purchase fertilizer and fuel to use in her farming work. In the future, she would like to purchase a new car for her husband to run a public transportation service, and rebuild her present house to make it bigger and stronger to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and fuel to use in her farming work

loans.name: Iris

texts.es: Iris, de 24 años, es una mujer buena y amable, es conviviente con Ney de 21 años, junto a el tiene un menor hijo a quien llaman Ney que tiene 2 años, ellos viven en su casa propia y trabaja mucho para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. El trabajo de Iris consiste en la venta de golosinas, todos los días sale a la vereda de su casa con su tablero (instrumento utilizado para acomodar golosinas para exhibir) y espera a que vengan los clientes en busca de sus diferentes productos a ofrecer. Al mismo tiempo está a la expectativa de su venta de repuestos de vehículos, negocio que lo tiene en su casa y ahí implemento un pequeño taller junto a su pareja y arreglan vehículos y venden algunos repuestos que los dueños de los vehículos necesitan. Lleva realizando su trabajo por 1 año y está muy orgullosa de decir que ha logrado avanzar mucho gracias al apoyo brindado por MFP. Le gusta su trabajo pues le permite estar a lado de su niño quien a su edad necesita mucho de los cuidados de su madre, le va muy bien ya que tiene buenas ventas y eso le permite tener buenas ganancias, espera seguir progresando y mas adelante poner una tienda de abarrotes. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual y responsable. Además está muy contenta de ser parte de su banco comunal ya que  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará mas golosinas y algunos accesorios y repuestos que ofrece en su local, está en etapa de expansión y utilizará de muy buena manera el capital prestado.
texts.en:
Iris is 24 years old and is a good and kind woman.  She lives with Ney, who is 21 years old, and together they have a young son named Ney who is two years old.  They live in their own house and work very hard to improve their family's quality of life.  

Iris works selling sweets.  Every day she goes out in front of her house with her board (an instrument used to display sweets), and she hopes that customers come in search of the different products she offers.  At the same time, she sells spare car parts, a business that she has in her house.  She and her partner put in a small workshop and they fix vehicles and sell some spare parts that the owners of the vehicles need.  She has been doing this work for one year and is very proud to say that she has advanced a lot thanks to the support provided by MFP.  

She likes her work because it allows her to be with her son, who is at an age when he needs a lot of care from his mother, and it is going well because they have good sales, which allows them to have a good income.  She hopes to continue progressing and later put in a grocery store.

This will be her second loan with MFP, and because of their cooperation, she can continue with her objectives.  She promises to make her payments on time and responsibly.  She is happy to be part of her community bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people.  With this loan of 800 soles, she will purchase more sweets and some accessories and spare parts to offer at her store, which is being expanded.  She will use the money provided in a good way.

loans.use: to purchase more sweets for her store, as well as spare parts.

loans.name: Dario

texts.es:
Darío de 38 años de edad, es un hombre emprendedor, carismático  con ganas de salir adelante. Es separado y padre de 2 hijos, de 12 y 10  años de edad, vive en su casa propia lo cual lo construyo con mucho esfuerzo. Vive en compañía de sus hijos por quienes se esfuerza día a día por salir adelante. La actividad que realiza Darío  es el cultivo de yuca y maíz, para eso cuenta con su propio terreno de 30 hectáreas, pero solo tiene sembrado 6 hectáreas de maíz y 1 hectárea de yuca, la cual está en crecimiento, lo cual los vende a los comerciantes de los mercados más cercanos de la localidad. Está actividad lo inicio solo con su propio capital, lo inicio sembrando 1 hectárea, al ver que es rentable sigue con la agricultura.
Lo considera rentable por que le da un buen ingreso económico y genera empleo para más personas. Nos comenta que se inició con esta actividad porque tiene deseo de ser un gran empresario y contar con sus propios ingresos y no depender de otros.
 Logrando tener buenos resultados, ahora tiene planes de continuar con su negocio y poner una tienda de ventas de abarrotes en un local alquilado buscando una zona comercial en la ciudad. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP.se siente muy contento de poder contar con el apoyo financiero brindado. Por lo tanto se compromete  ser puntual con sus pagos como lo viene siendo. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal ya que los considera  personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá pagando al personal quienes cosecharan maíz y yuca.
texts.en:
Dario, 38 years old, is an enterprising, charismatic man who wants to get ahead. He is separated and the father of two children, 12 and 10 years of age. He lives in his own home that he built with a great deal of effort. He lives with his sons for whom he works hard to succeed, day after day.

Dario cultivates cassava and corn and owns 30 hectares (about 74 acres) of his own land but he only has 5 hectares (12.36 acres) of corn planted and 1 hectare (2.4 acres) of cassava, which is growing. He sells to traders at the markets nearest his area. He started this business alone with his own capital, by first planting 1 hectare to see whether it is profitable to continue farming. He considers it profitable because it gives him a good income and generates employment for more people. 

Dario tells us that he started this business because he wanted to be a big businessman and rely on his own income and not depend on others. After his success earning good returns, he now has plans to continue with his business and to install a grocery store in a rented space and is looking for a commercial area in the city. 

This will be his fourth loan with MFP and he is pleased to be able to count on the financial support provided. Consequently he is committed to making his payments on time as he has been doing. As well, he says that he feels comfortable with his communal bank since he considers the people responsible and supportive. He will invest the 2,500 nuevos soles requested in paying a crew to harvest corn and cassava.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydee, de 28 años de edad, es una mujer empeñosa y con muchas ganas de trabajar, además de ser amable y cordial tiene muchas ilusiones para su futuro dado su corta edad. Es conviviente con Julio quien es comerciante y padre de su 3 hijos de 7 y 6 años de edad, y el último de 5 meses de nacido. Juntos viven en cómodamente instalados en su propia casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Aydee es el cultivo de Yucas, para eso cuenta con su propio terreno de 10 hectáreas, pero solo tiene sembrado 5 hectáreas de yuca, la cual está en crecimiento y una vez listo, los vende a los comerciantes de los mercados más cercanos de la localidad. 
Se inició con su propio capital, sembrando 1 hectárea y luego fue ampliando a más, viendo la demanda que tiene, y le faltaba para atender a sus clientes. Aprendió éste negocio de su padre, quien le enseño todo lo necesario, pues también se dedica a esta actividad.
Considera rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancias que le deja. Además de poder brindar a otras personas trabajo en las labores de cosecha.
Comenta que se inició en éste negocio por el deseo de ser una empresaria y contar con sus propios ingresos y no depender solamente de los ingresos de su pareja. Logrando tener buenos resultados, ahora tiene planes de continuar con su negocio y ampliar las extensiones de sembrío de yuca a 8 hectáreas, así generarse más ingresos y atender otros mercados. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP. Se siente contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. Por tanto, se compromete a ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal ya que conoce a la mayoría de sus miembros y los considera ser personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en el sembrío de más hectáreas de yuca, para así ampliar su capacidad de producción y poder atender la demanda de sus clientes, logrando generase más ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Aydee, 28, is an enterprising woman who wants to work.  Besides being friendly and polite she has many dreams about the future for someone so young.  She lives with Julio who is a merchant and they have 3 children, 7 and 6 and 5 months.  They all live comfortably in their own house that they bought with a lot of effort.  

Aydee grows yucca.  She has 10 hectares but she only has 5 planted with yucca.  After it is grown, she will sell it to the merchants in the markets near her village.

She started with her own capital planting 1 hectare and then added more because of the demand from her customers.  Her father taught her how to farm since that was what he did.

She feels that this business is worthwhile since it gives her a good income.  Also she can offer work to others when harvest time comes.
She states that she started the business  because she wanted to be an entrepreneur and have her own earnings and not depend on her partner’s income.  She had good results and now plans on continuing the business and expanding the crops to 8 hectares.  That way she will generate more earnings and cover other markets.  This is her 4th loan with MFP and she feels happy that she will have its financial support with her plans.  She promises to be punctual with her payments as she has been with the previous loans.  She also says that she feels content with the communal bank since she knows most of the members and considers them to be responsible and helpful people.  She will use the 2500 new sols to plant more hectares of yucca to increase her production,  fill the orders from customers and thus  generate more income.

loans.use: to rent land to plant yucca

loans.name: Adel

texts.en:
Adel, 31, is a young man who is married and has two daughters. He is a municipality employee who gets a low salary, but not enough to cover the family's needs.

Adel wants to purchase bedroom furniture for his two daughters to improve their home living conditions, so he is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing the new bedroom furniture. This will enable Adel to provide better home furniture for his daughters and improve the family's living conditions. 

Adel is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to purchase bedroom furniture for his daughters.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 54 años, es una mujer amable y trabajadora es conviviente con José de 46 años, con quien tiene cinco hijos a quienes crió y educo hasta hacerlos personas de bien y ahora son muy útiles a la sociedad, ella vive en su casa  propia a lado de su pareja con quien trabaja mucho para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Juana consiste en la compra y venta de pescado fresco a diario, desde hace 8 años se dirige al puerto del distrito de Yarinacocha en donde busca entre los pescadores los productos de mejor calidad, más frescos y sobre todo los más solicitados en el mercado del distrito. Su trabajo lo hace a lado de su esposo y es una mujer convencida que cuando se esfuerza y se entrega todo a un trabajo, siempre sale bien. Le gusta su trabajo, pues le permite disponer de su tiempo como a ella mejor le parece, además puede sentirse una mujer productiva en la economía de su hogar. Le está yendo muy bien, ya que tiene muchas ventas entre sus múltiples clientes que logro tener durante todo sus años vendiendo, gracias a los pescados frescos y de buena calidad que vende, desde que empezó a trabajar con éste negocio mejoro mucho su economía y desea seguir creciendo para mejorar así su condición de vida. Este será el decimoquinto préstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mas pescados para seguir vendiendo ya que desea vender mas variedad de especies a sus clientes que cada vez le exigen mas.
texts.en:
Juana is 54 years old.  She is a friendly and hardworking woman who is married to José, who is 46 years old.  They have five children who they raised and educated to make them good people, and now they are very useful to society.  She lives in her own home with her partner and together they work hard to have a better quality of life.  

Juana works buying and selling fresh fish every day.  For eight years, she has gone to the port in the Yarinachoca district to look for the fisherman who have the products that are the best quality, the freshest, and most importantly, the most requested in the district market.  She does this work with her husband.  She is a woman who is convinced that when you try and give everything to your work, you always come out well.  She likes her work since it lets her spend her time as she sees fit, and she can feel like a productive woman in her local economy.  She is doing very well, since she has many sales among her many customers that she has accumulated during all of her years of business, thanks to the fresh and good quality fish that she sells.  Since she started this business her finances have improved and she wants to continue growing to improve her condition in life.

This will be her fifteenth loan with MFP and she waits for their cooperation to continue with her objectives.  She promises once again to make her payments on time, like she has done with the past loans she had.  She is thankful to be part of her community bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people.  With this loan of 1500 soles, she will purchase more fish to continue selling, since she wants to sell a larger variety of species, since her customers are always asking for more.

loans.use: to purchase a larger number of different types of fish.

loans.name: Deynelly

texts.es:
Deynelly, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, le gustan los restos y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante. Es conviviente con Pedro quien es obrero y padre de sus 4 hijos de 18, 8, 4 y 1 año de edad por quienes se esfuerza en brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Juntos habitan cómodamente su propia casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Deynelly es la venta de bebidas gaseosas para esto cuenta con una refrigeradora que compro con un préstamo de MFP, y la instalo en su casa, de ahí atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes ganándose sus preferencia. Se inició con su propio capital y con el apoyo de su pareja, comprando en pequeñas cantidades fue juntando sus ganancias y volviendo a invertir, aumentando de esa manera su stock de mercaderías. 
Considera a su negocio rentable por las ganancias que le deja y la demanda que tiene sus productos por lo caluroso de la zona. Además comenta que no tenía apuros económicos, sino que quiso tener una ocupación para su tiempo libre, así sentirse una persona productiva y apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar.
Espera en un futuro abrir otro negocio de venta de abarrotes, acondicionando una bodega en su casa, así poder estar cerca de sus hijos y brindarles los cuidados que necesitan. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que tendrá una ayuda financiera para avanzar con su negocio. Por consiguiente, se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de bebidas gaseosas de diversos sabores y marcas así tener un stock variado y disponible para la venta, buscando precios cómodos por su compra en volumen, así tendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Deynelly is an earnest, hardworking woman with a strong wish to get ahead. She lives with Pedro, who is a laborer and the father of their 4 children, who are 18, 8, 4 and 1 years of age and for whom they work to provide a better quality of life. They live comfortably in their own house that they bought with much hard work.

Deynelly’s business is the sale of soft drinks and for this she relies on a refrigerator that she bought with a loan from MFP. She installed it in her house and from there she graciously waits on her customers, learning their preferences. She started the business with her own capital and with the help of her partner. Buying in small quantities, she began pooling her earnings to reinvest and thereby expand her supply of merchandise. She considers her business profitable because of the returns it provides and the demand for her products due to the area’s sweltering climate. As well, she notes that she did not have economic hardships, but rather wanted to have a job in her spare time and feel that she was a productive person and support her partner with household expenses.  

She hopes to open a grocery store in the future by setting up a stockroom in her house so that she will be near her children and able to provide the care they need. This will be her fourth loan with MFP. She is pleased to know that she will have financial help to move her business forward. Consequently she is committed to making her payments on time as she has in earlier loans. In addition, she notes that she is comfortable with her communal bank because she considers it a united and supportive group.

She will invest the 2,000 nuevos soles requested in the purchase of different flavors and brands of soft drinks and thus have a varied inventory available for sale. She will look for comfortable prices by buying in volume so that she will have higher profits.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of soft drinks.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica, age 34, sells music discs and tapes to earn a living. She and her husband Gerald have one child. She has been in this business for the past two years.

She was brought to KADET Ltd by a KADET client. This will be her first loan, which she will use to purchase more discs and tapes to offer for sale.

Her dream is to build a permanent premises where she can offer her products.

loans.use: to purchase more discs and tapes to offer for sale

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia, de 57 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en su propia casa independientemente; ya que sus hijos son mayores de edad que asumen sus propias responsabilidades. Julia, a pesar de su edad no le da importancia a no seguir laborando, al contrario desea ser una mujer emprendedora gracias al trabajo que realiza. Hace 13 años, trabaja vendiendo helados en la ciudad de San Francisco. Julia, es una mujer muy entusiasta que camina durante todo el día ofreciendo sus ricos helados para que la gente pueda refrescarse un poco ya que hace demasiado calor por esta zona. Asimismo, nos comenta que sus tiempos difíciles son las temporadas de lluvia ya que no hay mucha venta. Para mas adelante espera tener su propia tienda de heladería, es por ello que acude a MFP, para solicitar un préstamo que facilite su trabajo. Este será su crédito número 12 con MFP, está dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea ya que desea acceder a otro préstamo mas adelante.
Con los 500 nuevos soles, podrá comprar helados y de esa forma poder venderlas sin ninguna dificultad.
texts.en:
Julia is 57 years old and a very hard worker. She lives by herself in her own home. Her children are all adults and have their own responsibilities. Despite her age, Julia does not consider the thought of retiring, on the contrary she is still eager to be an entrepreneur and is able to thanks to the work she does. 

For the past 13 years she has worked selling ice creams in the city of San Francisco. She is a very enthusiastic person and walks all day offering her delicious ice creams so that people can refresh themselves a little, because it is very hot in this area. She told us that her difficult times are during rainy season because she doesn't have as many sales. Further down the road, she would like to have her own ice cream shop. It is for this business that she went to MFP to request a loan to make her work possible. This will be her 12th loan with MFP, she will make her payments on time and hopes to take out another loan in the future. With the 500 Nuevos Soles she will be able to buy ice cream and as a result will be able to sell them without difficulty.

loans.use: to buy ice cream.

loans.name: Leon

texts.es: León, de 30 años, es un joven alegre y decidido, vive en su propia casa, esperando tener un buen bienestar y una mejor calidad de vida. León, es un hombre de provecho se dedica a labrar la tierra para luego cultivar plantas de café, actividad que realiza hace mas de 22 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus jóvenes amigos; de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos parar luego ser compradas en las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le pagan buena ganancia por cada kilogramo de café que llega a venderlas. De la misma  forma que le resulta difícil transportar sus sacos de cosecha desde su chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicado en la localidad de Palmapampa. Ahora lo que prioriza es adquirir nuevas tierras para ampliar la plantación y de esa manera ampliar su producción y por ende lograr una buena estabilidad económica. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP, esta dispuesto a seguir pagando todas sus cuotas puntualmente. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café para incrementar su cultivo y con el resto contratará jornaleros para que le ayuden a sembrarlos.
texts.en: Leon, 30 years old, is a happy and determined young man.  He lives in his own house, hoping for his own well-being and a better quality of life.  Leon is a profitable young man who works the land to cultivate coffee plants, which he has done for more than 22 years.  During harvest time he counts on the support of his young friends and in this way is able to quickly pick fruit to be sold to the collection companies that pay good earnings for each kilogram of coffee he sells.  It is difficult for him to transport his sacks of harvest from his ranch to the collection center in the locality of Palmapampa.  Now his priority is to obtain new land to increase his plantation and therefore his production and ultimately achieve financial stability.  This will be his 3rd loan with MFP, and he is ready to continue making all his payments on time.  In his communal bank he is a very responsible member.  With the 3,000 nuevos soles, he will buy coffee plants to increase his crop and with the rest, will contract day laborers to help him plant them.

loans.use: buy coffee plants and contract day laborers.

loans.name: Maysoon

texts.en: Maysoon, a 40-year-old married woman, has five sons and daughters. She works in the data entry department of a company, and she has a small home-based business selling clothes – mostly women's dresses. She has applied for a loan to add more variety to her clothes inventory to start selling more youthful and fashionable clothes.

loans.use: to add more variety to her clothes inventory.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.es: Leonora, de 35 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Filomeno de 36 años y sus 02 estimados hijos a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Leonora, es una mujer sencilla, se dedica a labrar la tierra para  después cultivar plantas de cacao; esta actividad la realiza hace 16 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus vecinos para culminar rápido la cosecha de sus frutos y poder hacer el secado de los granos para luego llevarlas a vender a los centros de acopio. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder comercializarlas a buen precio ya que son de buena producción y considera que lo más difícil es tener que movilizarse con sus sacos de cosecha desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio. Para mas adelante espera en aumentar su producción. Este será su crédito numero 10 con MFP, esta dispuesta a seguir cumpliendo puntual con sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es una socia muy solidaria. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de cacao para aumentar su producción.
texts.en: Leonora is 35 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, Filomeno, who is 36 years old, and her two cherished children, to whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. She is a very simple woman who makes a living working the land so that she can plant cacoa plants. She has been making a living in this way for the past 16 years. During times of harvest she has help from her neighbors to be able to finish quickly so that she can dry the beans and later take them to warehouses to sell. The thing she likes most about her work is when she is able to sell her product for a good price, when she has a good harvest. The thing she considers most difficult about her work is transporting her bags of beans from her ranch to the warehouses. In the future she would like to increase her production. This is her 10th loan with MFP, she is in agreement to continue making her payments on time. In her communal bank she is a very supportive member. With the 2,000 Nuevos Soles she will buy cacao plants to increase her production.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants.

loans.name: Suad

texts.en: Suad is a 56-year-old widowed woman. Last year Suad opened a store for selling gifts and toys, so she can support herself after her husband passed away. Now she has applied for this loan to work on expanding the store and adding new shelves and more games for teenagers.

loans.use: to add new shelves and more games for teenagers.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina, de 42 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Celestino de 46 años y sus 05 estimados hijos a quienes brinda un apoyo incondicional. Los productos que con tanto esmero y dedicación  han logrado sembrar  Paulina y su esposo, le han ayudado mucho en el progreso de su vida.  Desde muy temprano empieza a laborar en sus tierras, ya que sabe que del cuidado que le brinde a sus sembríos de cacao, dependerá la calidad de los productos que obtenga.  Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy contenta cuando ve  buena producción de cacao; hace  más de 22  años que se dedica al cultivo de plantas de cacao; sin embargo  considera difícil llevar lo cosechado hasta los centros de acopio ubicada en su localidad de Palmapampa, lugar donde recibe mejores precios por sus productos, con el crédito solicitado podrá contratar a jornaleros para que le brinden el apoyo en el mantenimiento de sus plantas. Para más adelante, espera sembrar más plantas de cacao ya que cuenta con terrenos sin cultivar. Este será su crédito número 09 con MFP y sabe que su compromiso es pagar puntual sus cuotas. En su banco comunal es una socia muy solidaria.
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de cacao para que incremente es su parcela y con el resto contratará peones que puedan ayudarle a sembrarlo.
texts.en: Paulina is 42 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, Celestino, who is 46 years old, and their 5 loved children, who provide unconditional support. The products that Paulina and her husband have succeeded in planting with much care and dedication, have helped them greatly to get ahead in their lives. Starting very early they begin working in their land, knowing that the care they provide to their cacao plants will determine the quality of the end product. For the past 25 years she has made a living planting cacao. The thing she likes most about her job is taking care of her crops and she feels vary happy when she sees a good harvest of cacao. However, the thing she considers most difficult is transporting the harvest to the warehouses that are located in Palmapampa, which is where she is able to receive the best price for her product. With the loan that she is requesting she will be able to hire day laborers to help provide support in the maintenance of her plants. In the future, she hopes to plant more cacao plants, because she currently has land that is not being cultivated. This will be the 9th loan she has taken out through MFP. She promises to make her payments on time. In her communal bank she is a very supportive member. With the 3,000 Nuevos Soles she will buy cacao plants to increase her plot of land and with the rest she will hire workers who can help her to plant.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants and hire day workers.

loans.name: Alma Luz

texts.es:
Alma Luz de 47 años de edad, es casada desde hace 23 años, tiene cuatro hijos de 24, 22, 18 y 16 años de edad, quienes están estudiando y vive en Colonia Cerro Verde, Choloma, Cortes.

Doña Alma, hace aproximadamente 20 años que se dedica a elaborar y vender comidas, ella elabora desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, además elabora tacos, pastelitos, pollo con tajadas, carne asada con tajadas etc. Es muy trabajadora atiende a sus clientes desde muy temprano hasta en la noche.
Esta solicitando un préstamo de 8,000.00 Lempiras para remodelar el negocio, va cambiar el cerco de madera y unas puertas, para brindar un mejor servicio al cliente e incrementar sus ventas.
Está motivada con este negocio ya que sus ingresos no dependen de otro trabajo, y está cerca de su familia.
Su meta es ampliar y crecer su negocio para lograr obtener  un vehículo.
texts.en:
Alma Luz, age 47, has been married for 23 years.  She has four children, ages 24, 22, 18, and 16.  The children go to school.  She lives in the Cerro Verde neighborhood of Choloma, Cortex.

Alma has been making and selling food for approximately 20 years.  She makes breakfasts, lunches, and dinners.  She also makes tacos, pastries, chicken with fried plantains, and grilled meat with fried plantains, etc.  She is a very hard-worker, and she tends to her customers from very early until night time.

She is requesting a loan for 8,000 lempiras to remodel the business.  She will change the wood fence and some doors in order to offer better customer service and to increase her sales.  She is motivated in this business because her income does not depend upon another job, and she is close to her family.

Her goal is to expand and grow her business in order to get a vehicle.

loans.use: to remodel her business, change doors and wooden fence in order to provide better customer service.

loans.name: Marcia

texts.es:
Marcia, de 22 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y dedicada, tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante. Es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres en compañía de su mamá, su papá, si tía, y sus 2 hermanos.  La actividad que realiza Marcia es la venta de calzados de damas de diversos modelos y a la moda, también vende productos de belleza como cosméticos y otros. Todos estos productos son adquiridos por catalogo y son vendidos desde su casa a sus vecinas, amistades y familiares, a quienes atiende de manera amable y cordial, ganándose su preferencia, y la recomiendan con otras personas, de esa manera aumenta su cartera de clientes. Tiene más de 3 años dedicándose  éste negocio, contando con el apoyo de su mamá en la búsqueda de nuevos clientes.
Le gusta su negocio por los ingresos económicos que le genera, el poder manejar su propio horario de trabajo y sentirse independiente deseando convertirse en una prospera empresaria. Considera a su negocio rentable por la demanda que tiene y las buenas ganancias que le deja. 
Por tanto, tiene planes de continuar con su negocio y en un futuro abrir una tienda de venta de calzados de damas. Este será el préstamo número 2 con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Además de sentirse bien con su banco comunal pues considera a sus miembros ser buenas personas.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de calzados de damas de diversos modelos y a la moda para tener un stock disponible para la venta, buscando precios más bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
22-year old Marcia is a hardworking, dedicated woman who is eager to get ahead. She is single and lives in her parents’ house with her mother, father, aunt, and her two siblings. Marcia sells different types of fashionable women’s shoes as well as beauty products such as cosmetics. Everything is acquired from catalog and sold out of her home to neighbours, friends, and relatives. She always serves them in a friendly manner so she is their first choice and they often recommend her to other people. In this way she is increasing her customer base. Marcia has been doing this work for three years and gets help from her mother in finding new customers.

She enjoys the work for the income it brings in, the ability to set her own work schedule, and the feeling of being independent. She wants to become a prosperous businesswoman. She considers the business a profitable one as she has many orders and it generates a good income.

Marcia wishes to continue with the business and in the future open a shoe store. This will be her second loan with MFP and she is hoping that this small loan will enable her to accomplish her objectives. She is happy with her community bank as it is made up of good people.

With the 1000 soles loan, Marcia plans to buy more fashionable women’s shoes so that she has a bigger variety to offer her customers. By buying in quantity she will be able to obtain lower prices.

loans.use: to buy more shoes

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: Lourdes, de 29 años, es una joven soltera, vive en su propia casa; donde esmera dar lo mejor de sí misma para obtener un buen futuro. Lourdes, es una mujer muy activa y persiste en realizar los objetivos que se propone para obtener una buena estadía. Lourdes se dedica a labrar la tierra para después cultivar cacao, productos que son rentables en la localidad de Palmapampa.  En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de peones para poder extraer rápido los frutos. Sin embargo considera difícil las temporadas de lluvia ya que no puede elaborar el mantenimiento correspondiente; como fumigando y quitar las malezas que llegan a crecer entre sus plantaciones y a veces no cuenta con suficiente economía para evitar los daños que causan mala cosecha de su producción. Por tal motivo acude a los bancos de MFP para solicitar un préstamo que ayude con sus problemas. Este será su crédito numero 02 con MFP, está dispuesta a realizar sus pagos puntualmente. En sus banco comunal es responsable con las actividades que realizan. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, podrá contratar peones para que le ayuden a desyerbar la maleza que aquejan sus plantas.
texts.en:
29-year old Lourdes is single and lives in her own house. She is willing to go to a lot of trouble to obtain a better future for herself. She is energetically pursuing whatever needs to be done to achieve her objectives.

Lourdes works in the fields growing cocoa, a product that brings in a good income in the Palmapampa area. At harvest time she hires labourers to help her pick the cocoa quickly. The rainy season poses a problem as she cannot look after the fields as well as she would like; spreading insecticide and weeding between the plants are difficult to do then. Sometimes she cannot afford the supplies necessary to avoid a bad harvest. 

For these reasons Lourdes has approached MFP for help with her problems. This will be her second loan with MFP. She promises to make the repayments punctually. She is a responsible member of her community bank. With the S/.1000 loan Lourdes will contract labourers to help her weed the afflicted plants.

loans.use: to hire labourers

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora, de 35 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Sixto de 42 años y sus 04 queridos hijos a quienes desea una mejor calidad de vida. La señora Teodora, es una mujer dedicada a la agricultura como también a los deberes de su hogar. Con el apoyo de su esposo y de sus hijos puede cultivar y cosechar sus plantas de cacao y café, después de 23 años de trabajo pues sabe que también tiene dificultades, por tal motivo tiene que afrontarlas. Teodora desde que empezó a trabajar con MFP, nos comenta que le sirvió de mucha ayuda porque gracias a ello hoy sus cultivos son de gran producción. Este será su crédito número 07 con MFP y está dispuesta a seguir puntualizando sus cuotas de pago para después acceder a otro. En su banco comunal es una socia responsable. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, podrá  comprar plantas de cacao para poder incrementar en su parcela y con el resto comprará abono.
texts.en: Teodora is 35 years old, she lives in her own home with her husband, Sixto, who is 42 years old, and their 4 beloved children, whom she hopes to give a better quality of life. She makes a living as a farmer as well as cares for her home. With the support of her husband and her children she is able to cultivate and harvest her cacao and coffee plants. With 23 years of experience she knows that there will be difficulties, but that you have to deal with them. Teodora told us that since the time that she began working with MFP the services they offer have been very helpful because with their support she has been able to increase her production. This will be her 7th loan with MFP and she has committed to making her payments on time. She is a very responsible member of her communal bank. With the 3,000 Nuevos Soles she will be able to buy cacao plants to increase her plot of land and with the rest she will buy fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants and bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John, 39 years old, is a mixed crop farmer. He is married to Susan, also a farmer, and they are blessed with two children. He has farmed for the past ten years, earning 7,000 KES a month, and uses his income to support his family.

John is applying for a third loan after repaying his previous two loans successfully. He will use the 43,000 KES to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm.

With the anticipated profits from his farm he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.es: Marcelo, de 42 años, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, vive en su propi casa dedicándose a obtener un buen estado de vida. El señor Marcelo se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura, a pesar de estar solo siempre madruga para dirigirse a su parcela donde tiene cultivado plantas de cacao, lleva 23 años elaborando la producción de cacao y en tiempos de cosecha ve los resultados de todo el empeño que pone desde el momento que lo llegó a cultivar hasta el día de su cogida. Marcelo, considera que lo más difícil es no poder combatir con los animales que afectan a sus plantas; por lo que disminuye sus frutos; es por eso que acude a las oficinas de MFP, para poder solicitar un préstamo que ayude a tener buena producción. Este será su crédito número 09 con MFP, está agradecido con el apoyo financiero y en su banco comunal aconseja ser muy puntual ya que con el tiempo se puede solicitar otro préstamo. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles, podrá comprar abono e insecticidas para fumigar sus plantas de cacao.
texts.en:
42-year old Marcelo is a very hardworking man. He lives in his own house and is very keen to obtain a better standard of living. He works in agriculture. In spite of being alone, he gets up early to go to his fields where he grows cocoa plants. He’s been doing this work for 23 years. At harvest time he can see the results of all his efforts from the time of planting out to the day when he picks the cocoa. 

In Marcelo’s opinion the most difficult part of his work is dealing with the insects that attack the plants as they reduce his harvest. For this reason he has approached MFP for a loan to help him achieve better production. This will be his ninth loan. He is very grateful for this financial assistance. He advises his fellow community bank members to be punctual with repayments as they may wish to get further loans. With the S/.2,500 loan, Marcelo will be able to buy fertilizer and insecticide for his cocoa plants.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide for his cocoa plants

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric is 48 years old and married. He has five children aged between one and sixteen years old and takes care of six relatives as well.

Eric has been a tailor for 32 years. He works from 7:30 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. during the week, and he currently employs two people to help him.

Eric has requested a 500,000 RWF loan through Kiva’s partner Vision Finance Company to buy a new sewing machine. With his profits he can save for his future, renovate his own house and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann, 26 years old, has been rearing pigs in Nakuru for the last year. She is married to Leonard and together they are blessed with three children.

Ann was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our existing clients and this will be her first loan. She plans to use it to buy more  pigs to rear and later sell at a profitable price. This will enable her to make more income and improve her family's living standards. In the future, Ann hopes to invest more in her business and to be able to invest in other businesses.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina, 38 years old, is married to Ephantus and they have three children. She has operated a business selling herbal medicine for the past seven years.

Regina was brought to KADET LTD by a client. This is her first term loan in KADET LTD and she will use it to purchase more stock of herbal medicines to sell. Regina's hope is to venture into the real estate business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of herbal medicines to sell

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 46 años, es una mujer responsable, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Paulino, de 42 años y sus 06 queridos hijos; quienes son el motivo se todo su esfuerzo. Reyna, es una mujer bastante ocupada con los deberes del hogar y de su chacra, recibe la ayuda de su esposo y el apoyo de sus hijos. Reyna desde hace más de 28 años que lleva cavando la tierra para luego cultivar plantas de cacao. Los tiempos en realiza el mantenimiento y cosecha son de arduo trabajo es por ello que en esos tiempos acude a sus vecinos para que le apoyen en sus labores. Con el tiempo su mayor anhelo es poder contar con buena economía para ayudar en los gastos de sus hijos ya que son estudiantes; al igual que desea en aumentar su producción. Este será su crédito número 07 con MFP, una vez más agradece el apoyo de los financistas y seguirá cumpliendo con sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es una socia colaboradora en las opiniones. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar plantas de cacao para incrementar en su parcela y con el resto comprará fungicidas para fumigar sus plantas.
texts.en: Reyna, 46 years old, is a responsible person who lives in her own house, along with her husband, Paulino, 42 years old, and their 6 beloved children. They are the motivation for all their hard work. Reina is very busy with the household tasks and with her farm plot. She has help from her husband and the support of her children. For more than 28 years Reyna has been farming the land, cultivating cacao plants. The time she spends in maintaining the crop and harvesting is arduous hard work, so in these times she turns to her neighbors so they can help her with the work. With time, her greatest wish is to be able to count on a good economy to help her with her children’s expenses because they are students. She also wants to increase her production. This will be her 7th loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She is again grateful to the lenders and she will continue making her repayments. In her communal bank, she is supportive of other’s opinions.  With the 3,000 nuevos soles (PEN), she will buy cacao plants to increase the number on her parcel, and with the rest she will buy fungicides for fumigating her plants.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants and fungicides.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
Walter, de 27 años, vive junto a su pareja Deisy de 30 años quienes esperan tener un buen futuro gracias a los esfuerzos que ambos tienen.
Hace 12 años que Walter se dedica a labrar la tierra para luego cultivar plantas de cacao, que gracias al esmero y dedicación hoy tiene su propia chacra. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con la ayuda de jornaleros, de esa forma poder extraer rápido sus frutos para luego llevarlas a comercializar a los centros de acopio ubicado en la ciudad de San Francisco. Sin embargo le resulta difícil el transportar su cosecha desde la chacra hasta las empresas acopiadoras. Por ahora lo que mas prioriza es  hacer crecer mas sus plantaciones. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP, por el cual se compromete a cumplir con sus respectivas obligaciones, además agradece la confianza que lo esta brindando su grupo comunal.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará fertilizantes químicos para mantenerlas en buen cuidado a su plantación.
texts.en: Walter is 27 years old and lives with his wife, Deisy, who is 30 years old. They hope to have a good future together, thanks to both of their efforts. For the past 12 years Walter has made a living working the land to cultivate cacao plants. As a result of much care and dedication he now has his own small farm. During harvest times he has the support of hired workers, which allows him to pick the beans quickly so that later he can take them to warehouses located in San Francisco to sell them. It is difficult for him to transport his product from his land to the businesses where he sells. For now his highest priority is to increase his production. This will be his 5th loan with MFP, with which he promises to make his payments on time. He is thankful for the trust that his communal bank group has provided.
