Khorn, age 44, is a barber. He earns approximately USD 3 per day. His wife is a rice farmer who earns about USD 2 per day. Two of their three children are employed in a garment factory. Approximately, they earn USD 6 per day. The family lives in Kampong Chnang Province in Cambodia.

Khorn is requesting a loan in the amount of USD 500 to purchase aluminum alloy tube for constructing his house's ladder. In the future, he would like to run a grocery store from his home in order to generate more income for the family. He also wishes to rebuild his present house to strengthen it so as to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase aluminum alloy tube for constructing his house's ladder

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
Karla, de 28 años  de edad, madre soltera, es comerciante se dedica ala venta de ropa por lo que inicio su negocio con dinero que obtuvo mediante un préstamo ya que en ese momento no contaba con dinero para poner el negocio , ya había tenido experiencia con una pulpería dejo de dedicarse a este negocio debido a que su hijo se enfermo. Pero su hermana la ha apoyado y le ayuda a dirigir el negocio  de la venta  de ropa  la cual  vende desde su casa y ambulante y le ha ayudado a conseguir mejores ingresos para mantener a su hijo y los gastos del hogar.  

Ella realizo el crédito para la compra de uniformes, pantalones, camisas , pues son productos que son demandados durante la temporada escolar además que el crédito le permitirá ofrecer una variedad de ropa y vender mas. Una de sus principales metas es expandir su negocio de pulpería y tener una tienda general de ropa y variedades
texts.en:
Karla, who is 28 years old, is a single mother.  She is a storekeeper who sells clothing, which she began with the money that she got through a loan since at that moment she did not have money to put into the business.  She had already had experience with a corner store.  She stopped working at this business due to the fact that her son became ill.  But her sister has supported her and helps her to manage the clothing sales business which she sells from her home and through traveling.  She has helped her to get a better income in order to take care of her son and the costs of the house.

She used the loan to buy uniforms, pants, and shirts, since they are products that are in high demand during the school year.  The loan will allow her to offer a variety of clothing and sell more as well.  One of her main goals is to expand her corner store business and to have a general clothing and variety store.

loans.use: to buy uniforms, pants, and shirts.

loans.name: Jose Marcelo

texts.es:
Jose Marcelo tiene 30 años es soltero vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Jose Marcelo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas.
 
Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. El sueño de Jose Marcelo es tener dinero para comprar una casa y un vehiculo para el trabajo.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Jose Marcelo is 30 years old, single, and lives with his parents in Chillanes, Bolivar Province. He has no children.

The San Isidro Communal Bank consists of 10 members and is located in the canton of Chillanes, which is 45 minutes from the offices of Cooperativa San Jose. The members of this Communal Bank engage in agriculture, such as growing corn, blackberries, and beans.

Jose Marcelo is a farmer who grows corn, blackberries, and beans. He will use this loan to buy urea, fertilizers for his crops, as well as seeds. He purchases his supplies at the Silva Market and sells his products at the Sunday fair in Chillanes. His dream is to have money to buy a house and a vehicle for his work.

Jose Marcelo enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizers, and seeds.

loans.name: Anni

texts.en:
Anni, age 37, lives in Hartavan village with her husband and three children. Anni's husband is a retailer. He also helps Anni to run the family farm, where they cultivate land and breed cattle. As a result of hard work and patience, the couple has developed the farm and have been able to support their children. 

Anni wants to increase the number of cattle. She also needs some means to purchase necessary forage to feed the cattle. This loan will help Anni to earn more income, which is vital for her to cover the rising costs of the family and to ensure a prosperous life for her children.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and pay for cattle forage

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es: Dionicia, de 57 años es una mujer trabajadora, cuidó de su hijo Diofer, con quien vive en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cajas. Se siente dichosa, pues su hijo es todo un profesional y ahora trabaja. “Me ayuda es muy bueno”, comenta. Gracias a la fábrica de ladrillos que tiene, pudo sacar adelante a su hijo, ya tiene 30 años dedicándose a esto. Cuenta que le ayuda peones, quienes contrata para trabajar junto a ella, al mes hace una hornada que consta de 25 millares de ladrillos, los cuales traslada en camión a la feria que se realiza todas las semanas en la zona principal de ese producto en la ciudad. Ahí obtiene buenas ganancias, tanto así que ahora espera aumentar la cantidad que ladrillos que ase al mes, para ello quiere contratar más personal. Lo que más le gusta es recoger leña para quemar los moldes de arcilla que realiza, cuenta que es divertido, pues camina en el campo, su lugar preferido. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi banco” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues los integrantes de su asociación son responsables y solidarios. Dionicia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de arcilla, arena y demás insumos para la preparación de ladrillos.
texts.en: Dionicia, age 57, is a hardworking woman. She raised her son, Diofer, with whom she lives in her own home, located in the town of Cajas. She is very proud because her son is now a working professional. "He helps me and is a very good person," she states. Thanks to her brick factory, she has been able to help her son get ahead since she has been doing this activity for 30 years. She states that with the help of laborers, whom she hires to help her out, she makes 25 thousand bricks a monthly, which she then transports to the local market by truck every week in the city's brick district. She earns good profits there, so much so that she now hopes to increase her monthly brick production. For this, she would like to hire more workers. What she likes most about her job is gathering firewood to burn the clay bricks that she makes. She states that it is fun because she walks in the countryside, her favorite place. She is a member of the Mi Banco Communal Bank, and this is her fourth loan with MFP. She is grateful for the support she gets from all of you since she will obtain the loan that she needs to achieve her goals. Furthermore, she promises to be punctual in making her repayments since the members of her association are responsible and united. Dionicia will invest the loan that she is requesting in purchasing clay, sand, and other supplies needed to make bricks.

loans.use: to purchase sand and clay to make more bricks.
